meanings.definition: A person who makes articles of silver.
meanings.sent1: The talented silversmith crafted a beautiful silver necklace.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother's favorite teapot was made by a skilled silversmith.
meanings.sent3: The silversmith accidentally turned a spoon into a fork while working on a new design.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as sharp and precise as the tools of a silversmith.
meanings.sent5: The silversmith's workshop gleamed with the shine of polished silver.

meanings.sent1: He decided to silversmith full-time after retiring from his previous job.
meanings.sent2: She learned how to silversmith from her father, who was a master craftsman.
meanings.sent3: The young apprentice silversmith accidentally melted a silver spoon during practice.
meanings.sent4: She carefully silversmithed each piece, ensuring they were of the highest quality.
meanings.sent5: The old workshop echoed with the sounds of hammers as they silversmithed new creations.
